text: Eghtɨ nɨn ovavir boriba ua zuamɨra nguazir kamɨn izeghan kogham. Nɨn adarazi mangɨ namba 4ɨn ovavir boriba otivigh egh uamategh nguazir kamɨn izam. Ezɨ Amorɨn iti darazi datɨrɨghɨn arazir kurar avɨritabagh amir puvatɨ. Me gɨn arazir kuratabar amutɨ, kɨ mɨzazim me gasegh egh nguazir kamɨn me batuegham. Eghtɨ nɨn ovavir boriba uamategh izam.”
